participant_1.background:
I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair.
I enjoy playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active.
i eat too much fast food.
i work in academia at a local university.
i m saving for college.

participant_2.background:
I need a home with a large music room for my guitars and a space to display my pointe shoes.
I wish my car wasn't acting up so I could get to my music lesson on time.
I lift heavy weights and enjoy a meatless diet.
i watch youtube videos.
I'm a homebody but I'm excited to move to a new city to start my culinary career.

content.text: Hey there! It's going great, thanks for asking! How about you?
It's going well! I just got a new job in academia and I'm really excited about it.
That's awesome! Congrats! What kind of work do you do?
I'm a professor, and I'm really looking forward to getting started.
That's so cool! I'm a musician, so I'm always impressed by people in academia.
Thank you! I love music too. I play the piano and I used to take ballet lessons when I was younger.
That's so cool! I play guitar and I'm learning to dance ballet.
Wow, that's amazing! I've always wanted to learn how to play guitar.
It's really fun! You should totally give it a try.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go for walks, play with my parakeet, and watch YouTube videos.
Those all sound like fun things to do! I love YouTube videos too. I watch a lot of music videos and tutorials.
Me too! I love watching tutorials for cooking and dancing.
That's so cool! I'm always looking for new ways to learn how to cook.
Me too! I love trying new recipes.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great cook.
